summary: Mashup of Ulfric's armor and dragon scale armor and...I dunno, a Victoria's Secret corset.
descriptionHtml:
What's a revolutionary leader to do in his off time? Lounge about in his rank-smelling furs and chainmail? I think not! Risk being stabbed between ribs 4 and 6 while sleeping? Unthinkable!

Now, Ulfric or other world-changing heroes and villains (if that's your thing -- no judgement) can relax in this form-fitting fur and dragonscale armor, whether on the battlefield in the strategy tent or at home in the castle entertaining guests, without worrying about a surprise attack*.

* Coverage is very limited, see images for details.

Special thanks to Av1dPup1l for letting me use his armored bikini mesh!

REQUIREMENTS:

Av1dPup1l's armored bikini: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33430
Better Males, Sundracon mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488

INSTALLATION:

Drag .esp and mesh folder to the Skyrim data folder.

CRAFTABLE:

At the forge, under "dragonscale"
author: Seedye
